note: I’m a curious creature and an engaged observer. I recently quit ALL social media and started fresh on Mastodon. I haven't felt this liberated since 2009. I’m a dreamer and a thinker, still learning as I go and seeking ways to live a life of contentment amid the chaos of modern existence. I was a #caregiver to my mother for 15 years. This I know: We cannot survive as a species without the willingness to help each other. #RoadCyclist, #NordicWalker, husband, father, grandfather, #Humanist.
